description: This file is the main React frontend component for the Tic Tac Toe game. It manages game state, user interactions, UI rendering, and logging actions. It imports game logic functions, components such as Board, and utility functions for theme and logging.

methods.name: useGame
methods.description: Custom React hook managing game state, handling moves, reset, undo, and logging actions.

methods.name: StatusBar
methods.description: Component displaying the game status, current player, winner, or draw.

methods.name: Controls
methods.description: Component rendering control buttons for resetting, undoing moves, and toggling move history.

methods.name: HistoryList
methods.description: Component displaying the move history list.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React component for the Tic Tac Toe game, managing the overall UI and integrating all subcomponents.
